meanings: (말·힘·무기 등으로) fight, do battle (with), (말다툼하다) argue, quarrel, (전쟁을 하다) be at a war (with)
separate the two boys who are fighting

meanings.meaning: intervene between two persons who are quarreling

vlive.korean: 우리는 싸우고 뭘 한 적이 없어! We have never fought before! 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 이 브이앱을 보는건 destiny 야~~~
'오마이걸 언니들 싸우고 무대 선 적 있나요?' "Did you guys ever fight before going on stage?" 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 이 브이앱을 보는건 destiny 야~~~
vlive.english: "Did you guys ever fight before going on stage?"

vlive.korean: 싸우고 집에 가거든? fight, and then go home. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 멤버 중 홀로 데뷔 무산 된 연습생. "내 길이 아닐까요" <김준현의짠> 5회
세상의 정의를 위해서 싸우고 다녔겠지? I would've gone around fighting for justice, right? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 더비와 함께하는 BD🏹활
vlive.english: I would've gone around fighting for justice, right?

vlive.english: do you have a quarrel with your family members like Dami?
